name: Liminal World Final
description:
LIMINAL WORLD

INSTRUCTIONS READ BEFORE PLAY:

  • Use Chrome, Firefox or Edge only - Liminal World does not work on Safari
  • Click run game button, once loaded click full screen button
  • Click within the screen again once in full screen mode 
  • Use arrow keys and mouse to move
  • Spacebar to exit videos mid play
  • Follow the glass platform
  • Game has no end - play for as long as you want
  • Esc button to exit full screen
  • Click outside of game to regain mouse control

Credits:

  • Created by Ama Dogbe
  • Sound produced by Louis Jack
  • Technical support by Kwame Dogbe
